meanings.definition: A person who plays the cymbals in a musical performance.
meanings.sent1: The talented cymbalist added a shimmering sound to the orchestra.
meanings.sent2: The cymbalist stood at the back of the stage, ready to strike the cymbals.
meanings.sent3: The cymbalist accidentally dropped a cymbal, creating a comical clang.
meanings.sent4: The cymbalist's hands moved like lightning, creating a storm of music.
meanings.sent5: The audience was mesmerized by the skill of the cymbalist, who made the cymbals sing.
